document_title: Pradhan Mantri â€”Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan (PM AASHA)
objective: To provide price support to farmers and ensure their income
benefits: Price support for pulses and oilseeds
Price Deficiency Payment Scheme (PDPS) for oilseeds
Flexibility to choose between PDPS and Price Support Scheme
eligibility: Farmers must be registered within the stipulated time period
Registration data must be integrated with other government procurement schemes
how_to_apply: Register on a portal developed by the respective State/ UT Government
Integrate registration data with other government procurement schemes
notes: The registration data shall be verified by the States/UTs prior to procurement
